deck.name: Ace
deck.flavorText: The legendary hero, feared by villains and revered by all.

deck.name: Bakezori
deck.flavorText: A mischievous creature that roams the enchanted forests.

deck.name: Black_Solus
deck.flavorText: The dark lord who seeks to plunge the world into eternal night.

deck.name: Calligrapher
deck.flavorText: A skilled scribe with the power to enhance allies' abilities.

deck.name: Chakri_Avatar
deck.flavorText: An embodiment of celestial energy, bringing balance to the battlefield.

deck.name: Coalfist
deck.flavorText: A powerful golem forged in the heart of a blazing volcano.

deck.name: Desolator
deck.flavorText: A harbinger of destruction, leaving nothing but despair in its wake.

deck.name: Dusk_Rigger
deck.flavorText: A stealthy rogue adept at navigating the shadows.

deck.name: Flamewreath
deck.flavorText: A fiery elemental with a wreath of flames, leaving scorching trails.

deck.name: Furiosa
deck.flavorText: A fierce warrior known for her unyielding determination in battle.

deck.name: Geomancer
deck.flavorText: A master of manipulating the earth's elements to control the battlefield.

deck.name: Gore_Horn
deck.flavorText: A fearsome creature with horns that can pierce even the toughest armor.

deck.name: Heartseeker
deck.flavorText: A swift and nimble attacker, aiming for the hearts of its foes.

deck.name: Jade_Monk
deck.flavorText: A serene monk harnessing the power of ancient jade magic.

deck.name: Kaido_Expert
deck.flavorText: A legendary expert in martial arts, feared by foes and admired by allies.

deck.name: Katara
deck.flavorText: A skilled and agile warrior, known for her swift and precise strikes.

deck.name: Kindling
deck.flavorText: Ignite the flames of destruction with this powerful fire spell.

deck.name: Ki_Beholder
deck.flavorText: An ancient creature with multiple eyes, capable of seeing hidden truths.

deck.name: Lantern_Fox
deck.flavorText: A mystical fox carrying the glow of lanterns, guiding allies in the dark.

deck.name: Mizuchi
deck.flavorText: A water serpent with a mighty roar that can summon tidal waves.

deck.name: Orizuru
deck.flavorText: A crane with paper wings, symbolizing peace and grace.

deck.name: Scarlet_Viper
deck.flavorText: A deadly assassin with a venomous bite and a cloak of scarlet shadows.

deck.name: Storm_Kage
deck.flavorText: A master of lightning and storms, striking fear into the hearts of enemies.

deck.name: Suzumebachi
deck.flavorText: A giant hornet with a deadly sting, moving swiftly through the air.

deck.name: Tusk_Boar
deck.flavorText: A boar with razor-sharp tusks, charging through enemies with immense power.

deck.name: Twilight_Fox
deck.flavorText: A fox that thrives in the shadows, emerging at twilight to surprise its prey.

deck.name: Void_Talon
deck.flavorText: A creature from the void, wielding dark energies that consume all in its path.

deck.name: Whiplash
deck.flavorText: A serpent with a tail that moves like a whip, striking with incredible speed.

deck.name: Widowmaker
deck.flavorText: A mysterious and deadly assassin with a venomous touch.

deck.name: Xho
deck.flavorText: A wise and ancient mage, wielding the power of the arcane.
